title: Infant mortality rate in Greece 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Deaths per 1,000 live births, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2011.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2011 to 2008.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2016 to 2015.
gold: The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Greece from 2008 to 2018 . In 2018 , the infant mortality rate in Greece was at about 3.6 deaths per 1,000 live births .
